messages.title: A fairer society
messages.content: The Lib Dem plan for a fairer society.

messages.title: Working for Wycombe
messages.content: Steve Guy has a record of action for residents of Wycombe.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A fairer tax system. An income tax cut, giving £200 more to low and middle income workers.
Putting the triple lock on pensions into law.
Creating jobs and cutting taxes. More free childcare, improving local schools and creating jobs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Steve Guy and the local Liberal Democrats are fighting to keep [local organization name] against the [other party name] who have taken [local area name] for granted for too long.

issues.education: Improving local schools mentioned under key policies 'Help for Families'.
issues.health: I want to see our hospital services returned to Wycombe. Our Conservative MP wrote making this worse.

housing.content: Steve Guy and the Liberal Democrats want to protect Gomm Valley from Conservative plans.

leaflet.personalStatement: Steve has a record of action for residents of Wycombe. When local Conservatives closed our Air Ambulance, Parking was destroying the [incomprehensible] Steve campaigned with residents and [incomprehensible] the Conservatives are not on your side and council services have been slashed under the Conservative-led council. Steve is the new broom needed to sweep out the failing council.

politicalExperience.achievements: Steve has been a School Governor and a local councillor.

contactInformation.address: 14 Congrea Road, High Wycombe, Bucks, HP13 6EA

endorsements.endorsement: I want to see our hospital services returned to Wycombe. Our Conservative MP wrote making this worse.

images.caption: Steve Guy in various community settings.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes a tactical voting situation where the Liberal Democrats are positioned as the primary competitors to the Conservative party and references the historical voting percentages to illustrate this.
